description: Genius introduces its new innovative Energy Mouse, that combines a power bank function with a mouse. It's perfect for charging your smartphone anytime, anywhere. The Energy Mouse combines a 1200dpi mouse with a 2700 mAh power bank feature, bringing you the best of both worlds. Embedded in the mouse is a Li-polymer battery for excellent charge control and four LED lights to indicate battery capacity as well as charging status. Don't worry about the power bank used up all the battery. A special battery reserve feature is dedicated just for mouse operation. The bi-directional 2.4GHz anti-interference technology ensures a reliable working distance of up to 10 meters. Enjoy responsive cursor control and effortless scrolling. The two-in-one function saves travel storage space making Energy Mouse your mouse of choice when you're on-the-go.
title: Genius Wireless Energy Mouse with Built-In 2700mAh Powerbank for iOS and Android Smartphone Devices
